alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Butte; Custer Co Plains; Eastern Fall River; Haakon; Harding; Hermosa Foothills; Northern Foothills; Northern Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Oglala Lakota; Northern Perkins; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Foothills; Southern Jackson; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Oglala Lakota; Southern Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills; Western Fall River; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 10:36AM MDT until October 07 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation and the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
